content.text:
# Silent Spring Revolution

Silent Spring Revolution: John F. Kennedy, Rachel Carson, Lyndon Johnson, Richard Nixon, and the Great Environmental Awakening is a 2022 nonfiction book by Douglas Brinkley that examines third-wave environmentalism in the "long sixties" (1960â€“1973). The book was reviewed in several publications.
